original_title: Royal Shakespeare Company: Much Ado About Nothing
overview: A new Royal Shakespeare Company production for 2022 of one of Shakespeare's best-loved romantic comedies, filmed in Stratford-upon-Avon. In a colourful world where anything feels possible, two very different couples fall in love. With dastardly plots, hilarious slapstick and some of Shakespeareâ€™s wittiest dialogue, Roy Alexander Weise directs this classic tale of matchmaking and manipulation.
title: Royal Shakespeare Company: Much Ado About Nothing
